attributes.action: Re-open schools after the February Half-Term
attributes.additional_details: Students have had nearly 6 months of online school which is neither efficient nor as beneficial as in-person school. Children have been put last throughout this entire pandemic. However, students will not stand at the back of the queue any longer.
attributes.background: Vaccinate teachers ASAP so schools can reopen and children can get a chance at an education.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Have schools reopen after February half term, in England, as promised.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572322
